overview: You are the luckiest guy in the world. Seriously. Ever since you started working for Alexa, the owner of this luxury resort and spa, your life has changed not only for the better, but for the worse. Only the richest and most stunning MILFs visit this place, with perfect bodies. And their morals... they are non-existent. Become a masseur, yoga teacher or swimming coach... This spa is full of sexy women in need and there is no one else to take care of them but you.
title: Resort Of Lust & Luxury
